name: KIT109-Assignment1-Pong
description:
Controls
  • 1 player game - W (up), S (down)
  • 2 player game - P1 - Arrow up, Arrow down. P2 - W (up), S (down)
Game Controls and Rules
  • First to 10 points wins. Crush your opponent to taste victory.
  • Press reset to restart the game at any time.
  • Exit will take you back to title screen.
Notes
  • Best run in full screen
  • If you are having and issues running the game in window due to the aspect ratio, run the game in full screen mode. 
  • Enjoy! :)
